columns.Journal_ID: The unique identifier for each journal entry.
columns.Date: The publication date of the journal entry.
columns.Theme: The main topic or focus of the journal entry.
columns.Sales: The total sales figures associated with the journal entry.

journal.table_description: The journal records sales data tied to specific journal entries.

columns.Editor_ID: The unique identifier for each editor.
columns.Name: The full name of the editor.
columns.Age: The age of the editor in years.

editor.table_description: The editor maintains information about editors involved in the journal.

columns.Editor_ID: The unique identifier for each editor associated with the journal.
columns.Journal_ID: The unique identifier for each journal related to the committee.
columns.Work_Type: The type of work contributed by the editor to the journal.

journal_committee.table_description: The journal_committee records contributions of editors to specific journals.
